Sets the color of the Node/Tile Saves the original color
setEnd() - Method in class pathfinding.Node
Sets the node as end
setFCost(int) - Method in class pathfinding.Node
Sets the F-Cost for the Node, but only if the current F-Cost are higher
setFieldSensitivity(double, double, double) - Method in class thymio.Thymio
Method to change the Parameters for White or Black Field (depends on your Thymio) Default params: White = 900; Black = 250; Bias = 100
setGCost(int) - Method in class pathfinding.Node
Sets the G-Cost of the Node
setHCost(int) - Method in class pathfinding.Node
Sets the H-Cost of the Node
setMoveSensitivity(long) - Method in class thymio.Thymio
Method to change the Bias for driving.
setObstacle(boolean) - Method in class pathfinding.Node
Turns the Node into an obstacle or not
setOrientation(int) - Method in class pathfinding.Node
Sets the Orientation of Thymio on this field
setOrientation(double) - Method in class thymio.Thymio
This Method sets the Orientation.
setOrientation(String) - Method in class thymio.ThymioController
Sets the Orientation of Thymio North / Up = 0 East / Right = 90 South / Down = 180 West / Left = 270
setOrientation(String) - Method in class thymio.ThymioVisualController
Sets the Orientation of Thymio and flips the Image North / Up = 0 East / Right = 90 South / Down = 180 West / Left = 270
setOrientationByString(String) - Method in class pathfinding.Node
Sets the direction of Thymio on this node by using a String
setParentNode(Node) - Method in class pathfinding.Node
Sets the Parent node of the current Node
setSpeed(String, int) - Method in class thymio.Thymio
Setter for Thymio's speed Settings
setSpeed(List<Short>) - Method in class thymio.ThymioConnection
This Method is used in Class Thymio: Sends the Message "setspeed" to Raspberry and so on...
setStart() - Method in class pathfinding.Node
Sets the Node as Start
setStartField(int) - Method in class thymio.Thymio
Method to set the Start Field: 1 for white and -1 for black
